task-wr.title: Creating Segmentation Ranges Using the CLI
task-wr.shortdesc: You can use the CLI to add segmentation ranges to provider networks.

prereq.p: This sounds a bit like a prereq to me.(JO done)This task assumes that provider networks have already been created in order to unlock the compute nodes and make the system operational. For more information about creating provider networks, see Titanium Server System Administration: .

step.cmd: Use the neutron providernet-range-create command to create segmentation ranges.

stepxmp.p: This example creates segmentation ranges on provider network provider-net-a.

codeblock.userinput: neutron providernet-range-create provider-net-a \ --name pnet-a-common --description "External network access" --range 10-10
neutron providernet-range-create provider-net-a \ --name pnet-a-tenant1 --tenant-id ${tenant1_UUID} --description "Shared internal network" \ --range 623-642
neutron providernet-range-create provider-net-a \ --name pnet-a-tenant2 --tenant-id ${tenant2_UUID} --description "Shared internal network" \ --range 664-680
